name: Powerdrive 3 48V Club Car Charger 26580
description_html:
The Powerdrive 3 26580 is a charging component designed for electric vehicles. This battery charger is compatible with Club Cars and it is a 48-volt model. The 26580 models of PowerDrive 3 are also known as external battery models.

The Powerdrive 3 26580 can now be purchased here in Cloud Electric, your one-stop shop for all your electric component needs. Cloud Electric is a leading distributor of electronic components in North America. We take pride in our informative product descriptions, pricing, and shipping speed.
meta_title: Powerdrive 3 48V Club Car Charger 26580 - Cloud Electric

name: Curtis EZGO 48V 250A (ITS) Controller 1206HB-5201
description_html: The Curtis 1206HB are 48 volts controllers that are capable of varying the speed and the direction of an electric motor. This controller is compatible with EZGO vehicles such as 48 volts TXT, Express S4, Express L4, Terrain 2, MPT 800, MPT 1000, ST Sport II, Cushman Hauler 800, Cushman Hauler 1000, and Shuttle X4. The nominal voltage of the controller is 48 volts and has a maximum current limit of 250 amperes.
meta_description: Buy the Curtis 1206HB 48V 250A EZGO controller at Cloud Electric. Compatible with TXT, Terrain, and Cushman models. Fast shipping and warranty included.

name: Curtis AC Motor Controller 48V 235A 1206AC5201
description_html: The Curtis 1206AC-5201 controller, compared to most controllers in the 1206 series, operates and is compatible with an AC induction motor. These controllers have enhanced torque than stock controllers and are effective in regulating the speed of the vehicle. This controller is a 48-volt model with a 235-ampere current limit.
